code:
import asyncio

async def fetch_data(id):
    print(f"Fetching {id}...")
    await asyncio.sleep(1)
    return f"Data {id}"

async def main():
    tasks = [fetch_data(i) for i in range(3)]
    results = await asyncio.gather(*tasks)
    for result in results:
        print(result)

asyncio.run(main())
